restaurant.title: Dhaka Biryani
restaurant.description: Famous for its aromatic biryani, cooked with premium spices and tender meat

restaurant.title: Old Kabab
restaurant.description: Known for its rich, spicy kababs and parathas, a staple of Old Dhaka's culinary scene.

restaurant.title: Star Kabab
restaurant.description: A favorite spot for traditional Bengali dishes and mouthwatering kababs.

restaurant.title: Puran Dhaka
restaurant.description: Offering a variety of traditional Bengali sweets, made fresh daily.

restaurant.title: Pitha Ghar
restaurant.description: Known for its delicious pithas, served fresh and warm throughout the year.

restaurant.title: Food Court
restaurant.description: A bustling food court offering a wide variety of local and international cuisine.

restaurant.title: Curry Corner
restaurant.description: Serving flavorful curries and traditional Bengali rice dishes in a cozy setting.

restaurant.title: Grill House
restaurant.description: A popular spot for grilled meats and seafood, known for its vibrant atmosphere.

restaurant.title: Fish Hut
restaurant.description: Specializing in fresh fish curries and Bengali comfort food.

restaurant.title: Uttara Kitchen
restaurant.description: A family-friendly restaurant offering a mix of traditional and modern Bengali dishes.

restaurant.title: Food Express
restaurant.description: Known for its quick service and delicious Bengali meals at affordable prices.

restaurant.title: Motijheel Cafe
restaurant.description: A cozy cafe offering coffee, snacks, and light meals in the heart of Dhaka's business district.
